LanguageData.SolarPanelWallSmall.label: small wall-mounted solar panel
LanguageData.SolarPanelWallSmall.description: A small wall-mounted solar panel. Attaches to walls and generates electricity based on illumination.
LanguageData.SolarPanelWallMedium.label: medium wall-mounted solar panel
LanguageData.SolarPanelWallMedium.description: A medium wall-mounted solar panel. Attaches to walls and generates electricity based on illumination.
LanguageData.SolarPanelWallLarge.label: large wall-mounted solar panel
LanguageData.SolarPanelWallLarge.description: A large wall-mounted solar panel. Attaches to walls and generates electricity based on illumination.
LanguageData.MustPlaceAgainstWall: Must be placed against a wall.
LanguageData.WallSolarPanel.NotEnoughSpace: Not enough space to place the panel.
